name: auto_complete
description: Get auto complete suggestions by term or phrase

q.description: Any familiar term or phrase to get auto complete suggestions
q.title: Q

region.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG
region.title: Region

name: stock_get_fundamentals
description: Get fundamentals data

symbol.description: The value of symbol field returned in …/auto-complete endpoint
symbol.title: Symbol

modules.description: One of the followings (Separated by comma for multiple options) : assetComponents,assetProfile,balanceSheetHistory,balanceSheetHistoryQuarterly,calendarEvents,cashflowStatementHistory,cashflowStatementHistoryQuarterly,components,defaultKeyStatistics,earnings,earningsHistory,earningsTrend,equityPerformance,esgScores,financialData,financialsTemplate,fundOwnership,fundPerformance,fundProfile,futuresChain,incomeStatementHistory,incomeStatementHistoryQuarterly,indexTrend,industryTrend,insiderHolders,insiderTransactions,institutionOwnership,majorDirectHolders,majorHoldersBreakdown,netSharePurchaseActivity,recommendationTrend,secFilings,sectorTrend,summaryDetail,summaryProfile,topHoldings,upgradeDowngradeHistory,pageViews,financialsTemplate,quoteUnadjustedPerformanceOverview
modules.title: Modules

region.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG
region.title: Region

lang.description: One of the following is allowed en-US|pt-BR|en-AU|en-CA|fr-FR|de-DE|zh-Hant-HK|en-IN|it-IT|es-ES|en-GB|en-SG
lang.title: Lang

name: v3_get_chart
description: Get data to draw full screen chart

interval.description: One of the following is allowed 1m|2m|5m|15m|30m|60m|1d|1wk|1mo
interval.title: Interval

symbol.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.
symbol.title: Symbol

range.description: One of the following is allowed 1d|5d|1mo|3mo|6mo|1y|2y|5y|10y|ytd|max. Do not use together with period1 and period2.
range.title: Range

region.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG
region.title: Region

period1.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, such as 1556816400, must be different from period2, and the value must be starting of a day to get whole data in day. Don't use together with range parameter. Default: 0
period1.title: Period1

period2.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, such as 1562170150, must be different from period1, and the value must be starting of the next day to get whole data in previous day. Don't use together with range parameter. Default: 0
period2.title: Period2

comparisons.description: The symbols for comparison separated by comma. Ex : ^GDAXI,^FCHI
comparisons.title: Comparisons

includePrePost.description: Whether or not including pre post
includePrePost.title: Includeprepost

includeAdjustedClose.description: Whether or not including adjusted Close
includeAdjustedClose.title: Includeadjustedclose

events.description: One of the followings : capitalGain|div|split|earn|history. Separated by comma for multiple events. Ex : capitalGain,split
events.title: Events

name: conversations_count
description: Count total conversations relating to a symbol

messageBoardId.description: The value of messageBoardId field returned in …/market/v2/get-quotes endpoint
messageBoardId.title: Messageboardid

name: conversations_list
description: List conversations relating to a symbol

symbol.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint
symbol.title: Symbol

messageBoardId.description: The value of messageBoardId field returned in .../market/get-quotes endpoint
messageBoardId.title: Messageboardid

region.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG
region.title: Region

userActivity.description: Whether or not return current number of interacting users
userActivity.title: Useractivity

sortBy.description: One of the following createdAt | popular
sortBy.title: Sortby

off.description: The offset to start loading messages. It is fixed at 10 messages returned per response. Ex : 0 -> 9 -> 19 -> 29 -> 39 -> ... Default: 0
off.title: Off

name: calendar_count_events
description: Count the number of events happening in a period of time

name: calendar_get_events
description: Get events happening in a period of time
